DialogueOption.Text: Hey Tephra, got any new dirt for me before I take off?
I found where the weird rock goes when it hides, Tephra!

Dialogue.Page: Wha? Really?! Where does it go?

DialogueOption.Text: It travels to some sealed up cavern inside Timber Hearth.
It travels to a sanctuary inside Timber Hearth the Nomai made to protect Hearthians from a supernova.

Dialogue.Page: Huh... Uhm, I guess we can't really steal its as a hiding spot, if there's no way to get inside..
Oh, oh! But since the weird rock is cheating and hiding inside ghost matter, it's disqualified! Hah! We're the best hiders in the village again!
And you're officially the best seeker, astronaut! I knew you'd find it!
Good luck out there in space, astronaut. I know you'll find whatever you're seeking out there for sure!
Woah, really? The supernova is the bad thing the sun does that the exhibit in the museum talks about, right?
Why would the Nomai build something like that? Is it just an emergency hiding spot in case that happens someday?
But if it is, why would they seal it up and hide it like that? There's no way to get anything or anyone in or out of there now!
The Nomai are weeeird..
Wait, you're taking off today? Really?! I didn't know!
Aw, I'll.. I'll miss you, astronaut. Um, I don't really have any new dirt on me..
Oh, I know!
There's a new champion of hide and seek in the village, if that's dirt to you!

DialogueOption.Text: Oh? Someone better at hiding than you or Galena? Who could that be?

Dialogue.Page: It's a 'what', not a 'who'!
It's that <color=orange>weird rock at the museum!</color>
Um.. That's a really horrible joke to make, astronaut..
No, I'm talking about the <color=orange>weird rock outside the museum!</color>
Yeah, the weird purple rock in the exhibit right outside the museum! It's so good at hiding!
Oh, and I don't mean when it jumps behind you and scares you! I mean <color=orange>when it disappears completely!</color>
Galena and I both looked all over Timber Hearth to find where it goes when it disappears. But neither of us ever found its <color=orange>super secret hiding spot!</color>
Maybe you can help us find where it goes, astronaut.
If you find it, that'd make you the best seeker in the village!
